## Intro to R Day 3

This session will focus more on data visualization, regression, and some other key resources for R users. The focus is on helping different R as a statistical programming language for closed source resources like Stata, SAS, and SPSS. We will work through some applications of packages that I think would be game-changers for many peoples statistics workflows.
